issue.body:

issue.title: spicychat.ai
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [http://spicychat.ai](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fspicychat.ai) ### Comment > Account required to reproduce steps. Go to any character and send a message. The website will send the entire user conversation to "server.megabrain.co" to process for 'contextual ads', and then displays an ad in the chat. This site is not apart of the main service (SpicyChat). Blocking the URL stops the ads from appearing. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/jsydi6xv15sgc0k4s4osc40gksokwsorr1ed3vkgk0.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin System version: | Windows 10, version 22H2 Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Ad Blocking:
EasyList

AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy Other extensions used: | None
